messages.subject: I just got my HEM
messages.msgSnippet: Wow, what a wonderful magazine.  I just got my first issue and the one past issue I requested.  And you were right Ren, Ann s article, I am what I am was so
messages.messageBody:
Wow, what a wonderful magazine. I just got my first issue and the
one past issue I requested. And you were right Ren, Ann's
article, "I am what I am" was so good. It made me cry and hit
home. Needless to say, I stayed up until the wee hours reading
front to back of both issues. I am so thankful to have this
resource and the encouraging words of so many people. The kids
chose penpals from the bakc of the magazine and they wrote them
today. It is so important to make contacts ...networking is a
must. Thanks all for the reommendations.
Michelle
